医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现中风中心的访问率因收入而存在明显差异低收入社区获得中风中心认证的可能性降低 42%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240727/Study-finds-stark-differences-in-中风-center-access-by-venue.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240727/Study-finds-stark-differences-in-中风-center-access-by-venue.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b7330bae-4e25-4040-9fa3-3b5f07d46954 Sat, 27 Jul 2024 00:07:00 -0400 Study finds stark differences in stroke center access by income
莫菲特研究确定了默克尔细胞癌免疫治疗的预测生物标志物默克尔细胞癌是一种罕见但高度侵袭性的皮肤癌，以其快速生长和转移倾向而闻名。尽管免疫检查点阻断疗法有望增强人体针对癌细胞的免疫反应，但近一半的患者对这种治疗没有反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240726/Moffitt-study-identizes-predictive-biomarkers-for-immunotherapy-in-merkel-cell-carcinoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240726/Moffitt-study-identizes-predictive-biomarkers-for-immunotherapy-in-merkel-cell-carcinoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8fc5cbc1-a87c-4967-bfe3-20274e14c788 Fri, 26 Jul 2024 23:15:33 -0400 Moffitt study identifies predictive biomarkers for immunotherapy in merkel cell carcinoma
加州大学洛杉矶分校的科学家获得 30 万美元的资助用于研究胶质母细胞瘤微环境加州大学洛杉矶分校健康琼森综合癌症中心的医学和生物化学助理教授、科学家 Aparna Bhaduri 博士和神经外科助理教授、神经外科医生 Kunal Patel 博士荣获麦克奈特基金会颁发的 2024 年脑部疾病神经生物学奖神经科学基金，支持研究神经和精神疾病的美国科学家的创新研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240726/UCLA-scientists-awarded-24300000-grant-to-study-glioblastoma-microenvironment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240726/UCLA-scientists-awarded-24300000-grant-to-study-glioblastoma-microenvironment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c4b39ecf-9fea-4a3e-aa0c-f3ebeb31a1fd Fri, 26 Jul 2024 22:48:00 -0400 UCLA scientists awarded $300,000 grant to study glioblastoma microenvironment
本身存在劳资纠纷的工会威胁要切断工人的健康福利美国最大的工会全国教育协会威胁将于 8 月 1 日切断华盛顿特区约 300 名员工的医疗保险，以结束一场激烈的合同纠纷。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240726/Union-with-labor-dispute-of-its-own-threatens-to-cut-off-workerse28099-health-benefits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240726/Union-with-labor-dispute-of-its-own-threatens-to-cut-off-workerse28099-health-benefits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=061bfa38-cef3-4c6f-aaf5-0b2bdef1de13 Fri, 26 Jul 2024 22:32:00 -0400 Union with labor dispute of its own threatens to cut off workers’ health benefits
疾病预防控制中心的禽流感检测有效，但存在问题美国疾病控制与预防中心表示，禽流感测试中的故障并未损害该机构的疫情应对措施。但它引发了人们对其在新出现的病原体检测中单独行动的方法进行审查。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240726/The-CDCe28099s-test-for-bird-flu-works-but-it-has-issues.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240726/The-CDCe28099s-test-for-bird-flu-works-but-it-has-issues.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3b58772d-511c-4fc9-9e41-9ac921170bb5 Fri, 26 Jul 2024 22:30:47 -0400 The CDC’s test for bird flu works, but it has issues
医生姿势影响患者体验和结果一项新的研究表明，在与患者谈论诊断或护理时，与患者保持视线水平确实可以产生不同的效果。根据新的证据审查，坐在或蹲在住院患者的床边比站着更能带来信任、满意度，甚至更好的临床结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240726/Physician-posture-impacts-病人-experience-and-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240726/Physician-posture-impacts-病人-experience-and-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4108d6b0-8992-48d6-a3de-846a1e9610a8 Fri, 26 Jul 2024 08:17:21 -0400 Physician posture impacts patient experience and outcomes
与 Tammy Newbold 一起了解兽医学领域监管 CMC 的全球协调在本次采访中，News Med 与 Tammy Newbold 讨论了兽医医学领域监管 CMC 的全球协调。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240726/Understanding-Global-Harmonization-of-Regulatory-CMC-within-Veterinary-Medicine-with-Tammy-Newbold.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240726/Understanding-Global-Harmonization-of-Regulatory-CMC-within-Veterinary-Medicine-with-Tammy-Newbold.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9dc519b4-91ed-40c7-b056-01b7c6ae3615 Fri, 26 Jul 2024 07:26:00 -0400 Understanding Global Harmonization of Regulatory CMC within Veterinary Medicine with Tammy Newbold
通过 CAR 增强剂疗法克服癌症复发尽管 CAR T 细胞疗法彻底改变了某些癌症的治疗方法，但仍存在一个重大局限性：许多患者，包括那些癌症完全缓解的患者，最终会复发。在一项新的研究中，丹娜—法伯癌症研究所的研究人员报告了一种有可能消除该问题的技术。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240726/Overcoming-cancer-relapse-with-CAR-Enhancer-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240726/Overcoming-cancer-relapse-with-CAR-Enhancer-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9871784b-dc2e-442c-b53e-8fde3fa98e7a Fri, 26 Jul 2024 06:00:53 -0400 Overcoming cancer relapse with CAR-Enhancer therapy
细胞竞争决定女性体内 X 染色体的使用MRC 医学科学实验室淋巴发育小组在《自然遗传学》上发表的一项新研究表明，表达母本或父本 X 染色体的细胞的贡献可以选择性地偏向于身体的不同部位。该研究利用千人基因组计划的人类数据，结合人类 X 染色体相关 DNA 序列变异的小鼠模型，以增进我们对具有两条 X 染色体的生物学女性个体发育的基本理解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240726/Cellular-competition-determines-X-chromosome-usage-in-female-bodies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240726/Cellular-competition-determines-X-chromosome-usage-in-female-bodies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2ae76e4a-c067-4736-b97d-9d3ad0381a68 Fri, 26 Jul 2024 05:50:00 -0400 Cellular competition determines X chromosome usage in female bodies
焦虑对痴呆症发展的长期影响慢性、已解决和新发焦虑与全因痴呆（影响记忆和思维的进行性认知衰退）风险之间的纵向关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240726/Anxietye28099s-Long-Term-Impact-on-Dementia-Development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240726/Anxietye28099s-Long-Term-Impact-on-Dementia-Development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=364ab5ed-1548-46c7-9e47-7b43984fbf92 Fri, 26 Jul 2024 05:38:00 -0400 Anxiety’s Long-Term Impact on Dementia Development
